channel.title: Tutorial-series on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorial-series on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Web Development Basics
item.description: This series covers the fundamental building blocks of web development. You’ll learn HTML for structure, CSS for styling, and JavaScript for interactivity - the three core technologies of the web. Perfect for beginners looking to start their web development journey. Each tutorial builds on the previous one, providing a comprehensive foundation for creating modern websites.
